title: ThomasTenX
author: ThomasTenX
created_time: November 07, 2023, 11:42:26 AMLast edit: November 07, 2023, 02:57:10 PM by ThomasTenX
content: Hey, I am Thomas from TenXStudios -  https://tenxstudios.xyz/I am looking for a brand new client!What I personally offer as a CM: 1. Community management (8 hours a day - 5 days a week, no weekends)2. Discord/Telegram games hosting ( I can host quizzes and other minigames to boost activity in your server and make it more lively) 3. Telegram/Discord security (setting up bots, you can be sure that your server is in good hands as I manage over 200k members (Discord + Telegram combined) 4. Clearing support tickets. (if you have a support ticket system I can help you with answering those)5. Community incentives creation (social progression system)You can check our previous/current clients on our website. Price: 500$/month. If you are happy with my work during the first month we are going to sign a 6-month contract. Additionally, if you require more services such as articles, content, videos, graphics, and more - we have it all. If you are interested, DM me and we will set up a call!; Or message me via Telegram: https://t.me/ThomasM10Thank you!

comments.author: Porfirii
comments.body: Hey Thomas, welcome to the forum. I knew a Thomas here some years ago who also worked in community management, and I wonder if it is you from a brand new account, although it seems improbable.BTW, I have checked your website and there is no mention to the means of payment. If I'm not wrong, you are accepting Bitcoin, aren't you?Either way, good luck with your project.

comments.author: ThomasTenX
comments.body: Hey Porfirii! Well, it's my second post here, so I really doubt that  . Also Thomas is a pretty common name, so you know how it goes! We accept crypto and other means of payment; we usually discuss it internally during our call.

comments.author: Porfirii
comments.body: Quote from: ThomasTenX on November 07, 2023, 02:56:05 PMHey Porfirii! Well, it's my second post here, so I really doubt that  . Also Thomas is a pretty common name, so you know how it goes! We accept crypto and other means of payment; we usually discuss it internally during our call.You're right, Tom is a very common name. But the fact that I met him in this forum and he worked as a community manager increased the probabilities of a coincidence.As long as you accept Bitcoin, you are in the right board. Again, best luck with your project.
